title: How to show the battery percentage on the iPhone 12 - Quora

response.answer_text: Quick Look: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pqB7W Way 1. Swipe Down to View Battery Percentage  Way 2. Add The "Batteries" widget to the home screen  Way 3. Ask Siri, such as"Battery left" Way 4. Charge your iPhone 12, then the screen will show the current battery percentage at once. Way 5. Go to Settings, and tap "Battery", your battery statistics will show up.
